author: ZMG - Buzz60
title: Super Rare Lemur Species Finds Hope in Adorable Newborn
text:
Super Rare Lemur Species Finds Hope in Adorable Newborn
From the
[Sea turtles returned home after being rescued in Florida, and more of today's top videos](/news/nation-world/sea-turtles-returned-home-after-being-rescued-in-florida-and-more-of-todays-top-videos/collection_18a3e968-462e-5b3c-aea6-8a88f56ed30f.html) series
In England, conservationists at the Chester Zoo are celebrating the birth of a critically endangered lemur which is hoped to help save the ultra-rare species from extinction. The tiny Coquerelâ€™s sifaka lemur arrived to parents Beatrice and Eliot at 120 grams, following a healthy five-month pregnancy. Yair Ben-Dor has more.
